execution_quality: The agent provided no response to either the question or feature proposal, failing to engage with architectural or design discussions.
work_category: User posed a design question about bundling music with releases, then immediately pivoted to proposing an onboarding feature enhancement.
summary: The user asked about music bundling capabilities, then expanded scope to include onboarding improvements, but the agent took no action or provided feedback on either proposal. The user appears to have been thinking aloud rather than expecting immediate implementation.
follow_up_pattern: User did not wait for clarification on the music bundling question and instead added a new, more detailed feature request about onboarding.
